Rob Itter organizes 
 some of these fun runs.

1375.44.text:
he's been riding in the 
valley for over eight years.

1378.21.text:
It was funny because 
when we first took off,

1380.58.text:
we had the same look 
on our face.

1382.28.text:
It was like okay, 
let's do this.

1383.45.text:
As soon as we started 
going up that hill,

1384.88.text:
I looked and you had this 
big smile on your face,

1387.12.text:
and I figured 
I probably had one too.

1389.19.text:
(Rob Itter) 
When the stoplights and 
the city's in the mirror,

1392.19.text:
that's when you know 
you're starting to ride.

1394.56.text:
You gotta get 
out of the city.

1397.56.text:
-This is just a great hangout, 
a great destination.

1400.43.text:
You're up in the hills, 
the best weather.

1402.50.text:
When it's hot, 
up here it's cool.

1404.24.text:
You got excellent food, 
barbecue, cold beer.

1406.40.text:
It just doesn't get 
much better.

1408.84.text:
The Mountain Springs Saloon 
 was built in 1953

1411.18.text:
and became a popular 
 destination for bikers

1415.38.text:
So Rob, there's a saying 
that I've heard people say.

1419.38.text:
-Blood makes you related, 
the road makes you family.

1425.36.text:
and if you haven't ridden 
a motorcycle on the road

1429.69.text:
you wouldn't know 
just how good this feels.

1433.43.text:
You wouldn't know the 
camaraderie until you do it.

1435.93.text:
-What if I told you, Rob, 
your bike's in the shop.

1438.47.text:
I'm sorry, you won't 
have it for six weeks.

1440.61.text:
What would you do?
-No, that can't happen.

1443.88.text:
The bike's gotta be done 
and ready to go;

1449.65.text:
because it stands out
from everybody else's.

1451.82.text:
-It's a 2010 Street Glide, 
a little work done to it

1454.92.text:
like exhaust, body work,
a good running bike.

1460.19.text:
-What about the color?
-The color is red.

1462.73.text:
They actually came out 
with that red

1464.80.text:
for the fire department 
in the beginning.

1466.90.text:
They came back out 
with it in 2010

1470.07.text:
Firefighters go way back 
 with Harley Davidson,

1473.94.text:
The first Harley sold 
 to a police department

1476.34.text:
dates back to 1908 
 in Detroit, Michigan.

1481.71.text:
having a good time 
and seeing parts of Nevada

1485.02.text:
you're not going to see 
from your car, isn't it?

1487.72.text:
-No, there's nothing like 
seeing the road from a bike.

1490.52.text:
-By the way, I haven't 
ridden a lot with clubs.

1493.53.text:
How did I do?
-You did great.

1496.93.text:
-I fit right in?
-I'll ride with you anytime.

1499.23.text:
-Get out and ride--
it's that simple.

1501.10.text:
The Silver State 
has so much to explore

1503.23.text:
and there's so many 
ways to do it,

1505.54.text:
and renting a motorcycle 
is definitely on the list.

1508.37.text:
Are you having 
a burger as well?

1510.17.text:
-I am having a burger.
-I promised you I'm buying.

1512.64.text:
Let's go.
-All right. Let's do it.

1519.28.text:
I think I could get used 
 to the biker lifestyle.

1592.82.text:
comes from 
 Land Rover Las Vegas
